strategy: Biel-Tan Eldar armies have a Strategy Rating of 4.
Initiative: Aspect Warrior formations, Titans and the Avatar have an Initiative Rating of 1+. All other formations have an Initiative Rating of 2+.
usage: v1.0.0: The EA-R Craftworld Biel-Tan is based on the NetEA version of the list, with a number of changes and additions.

The army structure has been kept intact, but the number of Troupes per Warhost have been decreased to two. To compensate for this, the Guardian and Aspect Warrior Warhosts' Wave Serpents has become cheaper, in line with the general approach to similar transport options in other lists. Wraithguards has been changed to 3+ Armour (mostly because of the Iyanden Craftworld list). The basic size of the Ranger Troupe has been increased to five, which combined with the War Walkers being cheaper creates more of an equivalence between these two Scout / Garrison options. The War Walker has had its Armour simplified, replacing the oddball 6++ save with a straight 5+.

The Swords of Vaul Troupe has recieved an option to carry Guardians, which both utilizes their seldomly used transport capability and presents an option to field a very different kind of formation from the normal one. The Fire Prism formation (along with the Fire Prism stats) has been imported from E-UK, reducing the reliance on taking Firestorms.

The Void Spinner, being a very powerful choice, has been increased in points, while the Engines of Vaul formation now has a standard 50 point rebate when taking larger formations. The Engines also benefit the changes to the Holofield rule, having a 5+ Holofield Save. The Cobra now has the standarized 'Shield Piercer' rule.

The once rare Nightwings can now be taken in pairs, but has shorter range on their Shuriken Catapults. The fragile Vampire Raider has recieved a 5+ Holofield Save. The Phantom and Warlock Titan has been reduced in points. While these are very powerful formations, they are also quite fragile, especially in comparison to the Titans of most other factions. This also compensates a bit for army's reduced Warhost/Troup ratio. The Phantom Titan has seen a slight increase in range on its Pulsar, making the dual Pulsar loadout slightly more viable. The Warlock Titan's Psychic Lance now benefits from the 'Shield Disruptor' rule.

formations.name: 0-1 Wraithgate
formations.units: Replace one objective marker in the Eldar player's half of the table with a Wraithgate, this counts as an objective marker and a Webway Portal which may not be attacked or damaged in any way.

formations.name: Aspect Warrior Warhost
formations.units: Eight Aspect Warrior units chosen from the following: Dark Reapers, Dire Avengers, Fire Dragons, Howling Banshees, Shining Spears, Striking Scorpions, Swooping Hawks, Warp Spiders
extraUnits: Add four Wave Serpents: 150 points (may only be taken if the entire formation can fit inside)

formations.name: Guardian Warhost
formations.units: One Farseer unit and seven Guardians
extraUnits: Heavy Weapons, Support Weapons, Wraithguard, Wraithlord.
Add four Wave Serpents: 150 points (may only be taken if the entire formation can fit inside)

sections.name: Biel-Tan Troupes
sections.description: Up to two Biel-Tan Troupes may be taken for each Biel-Tan Warhost

formations.name: Ranger Troupe
extraUnits: Add up to one Eldar Rangers for 25 points

formations.name: War Walker Troupe
extraUnits: Add up to two War Walkers for 25 points each

formations.name: Falcon Troupe
extraUnits: Replace up to two Falcons with Firestorms: Free
Add five Guardians to the formation: 75 points

formations.name: Void Spinner Troupe
extraUnits: Add up to two Void Spinners for 250 points each

formations.name: Engines of Vaul Troupe
formations.units: One Engine of Vaul chosen from the following: Cobra, Scorpion, Storm Serpent
extraUnits: Add up to two additional Engine of Vaul for 200 points each chosen from the following: Cobra, Scorpion, Storm Serpent

sections.name: Biel-Tan Aircraft, Spacecraft and Titans
sections.description: Up to a third of the points available may be spent on these formations

upgrades.title: Biel-Tan Upgrades
upgrades.description: Each upgrade may be taken once per formation

items.name: Autarch (Max one per army)
items.description: Replace one Eldar Exarch with an Eldar Autarch

items.name: Exarchs
items.description: Add up to two Eldar Exarchs

items.name: Heavy Weapons
items.description: Replace up to three Eldar Guardians with Eldar Heavy Weapon Platforms

items.name: Support Weapons
items.description: Add three Eldar Support Weapon Platforms

items.name: Vypers
items.description: Replace any number of Eldar Jetbikes with Eldar Vypers
